reviews.title: Great location
reviews.text: The Pullman Montparnasse in the 14th Arr.in Paris is in a great location. Good price for accommodations. The bed is wonderful, if I hadn't been in Paris and on business, I would have been fine staying in the bed and slumbering.

reviews.title: Beautiful Hotel
reviews.text: What a great spot. This hotel is in a great location for tourists as it is right on the metro line and is very nice inside! The rooms are clean and beautiful. The staff were excellent. Had a great time :)
I really enjoyed the view we had from the 17th floor.
reviews.title: Beatiful Paris

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Went to Paris for a weekend and had the opportunity to stay at Pullman Paris Montparnasse for 2 nights. The location is very nice just in front Gare Montparnasse (railway station) with access to everywhere by public transportation. Nearby Quartier Latin wich is lovely to go out at night and have a drink. Around the corner is also Tour Montparnasse with scenic views to the city (try not to miss Restaurant Ciel de Paris). The hotel itself is high quality, modern and recently renewed. Helpful frontdesk staff and lovely commercial team. The room is well decorated and have all the ameties expected for an hotel this level. A nice expercience during the weekend even though didn´t spent much time at the hotel. Will definately recommend to friends and clients in the future.
reviews.title: Great hotel

reviews.text: We upgraded to the Deluxe King room which was large for Paris standards. The room was very clean, had a good view (10th floor), and the bed was exceedingly comfortable. Mini-bar was unsurprisingly over-priced however there is a small supermarket just next door - we also chose to forgo the hotel breakfast/dinner as there are many local restaurants. The room did have some useful amenities such as British and USB plug sockets. The hotel is just across from the Montparnasse station which has excellent metro links to all of Paris, and for those flying into CDG there is a AirFrance bus that you can catch from the airport to a bus stop just across the road from the hotel. Overall we had a great stay, and although the hotel was quite "corporate" it suited us perfectly.
reviews.title: A very good choice in the heart of Paris.

reviews.text: Had a great couple of days in this hotel staying on the 10th floor.
reviews.title: Great Hotel (but not at rack Rate!)

reviews.text: Great hotel for a city break in Paris. The fact that this is a franchise hotel means that the rooms are bigger than the standard 'cosy' Parisien hotel rooms.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel!

reviews.text: We were on the 15th floor of this 25 floor hotel, giving us a view of the city similar to that from the Eiffel Tower or top of Montmartre!
reviews.title: Great Location

reviews.text: Our booking was room only and we were glad of this when we saw the HUGE queues for breakfast each morning. There are two supermarkets on the street where we grabbed breakfast each morning, The hotel is situated across from the Gare Montparnasse which makes transportation to the airport and the rest of the city, very easy!
reviews.title: A Great Place to Stay for Business

reviews.title: Very high handed behavior

reviews.text: Enjoyed our 10 day stay here for the most part, while husband here on business. Metro being close to the hotel was fabulous. Recommend using the 13 line around the corner, especially for returning to the hotel, since the metro return in gare montparnasse, altho across the street, would often require a long walk thru the underground tunnels or on the street if you exit the huge train station on the other side. If you like to walk instead of metro, there are some sites within walking distance. Immediate area around the hotel not so pleasant, but about a 10-15 min walk away in Montparnasse area is a nice place to stroll, shop and eat. Easy transport from the airport on air France bus drops you across the street from the hotel.
reviews.title: Good location

reviews.text: Consierge staff was helpful for selecting restaurants, altho sometimes lacked patience in giving directions or were too vague. I think Greg was the most helpful.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Had trouble with air conditioning in the room, but it was corrected. Room had no good place to put clothes. Just some shelves in corner of closet next to the bed, so awkward to use and some hangers. Mostly used suitcase. Maid did not always replace used items. Minor issues. Room ok. Had bidet and toilet. Odd swinging glass door on high sided tub for shower. Ice maker on floor was broken the entire week. Had a hot pot in the room but no tea or coffee.
reviews.title: Good Location, service just OK...

reviews.text: We received no free drink or chocolate, but did have some complimentary water for only a few days (?) Maybe because on business for part of the trip? Bar area was expensive and extremely hot, with bright lights on all evening. Our business group used it anyway!
